<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Siege Castles of Absalom](/Articles.aspx?ID=34)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege](/Sources.aspx?ID=54) pg. 66</row>

Explore the mysterious ruins left behind by the many forces that have tried—and failed—to capture Absalom.
